body.name: 基于二分Kmeans的层次聚类
body.description: 输入数据的格式为TXT格式，输入文件根目录为点数据根目录，基于二分Kmeans算法计算各点数据属于的类别
body.algo: 二分Kmeans算法属于自顶而下的层次聚类方法,
body.input: [{"path":"hdfs","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"x1","description":"一维点坐标","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"x2","description":"二维点坐标","required":"true"}]},{"path":"hdfs","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"x1","description":"一维点坐标","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"x2","description":"二维点坐标","required":"true"}]}]
body.out: [{"path":"file","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"String","name":"ClusterID","description":"点所属类别","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Array[Double]","name":"CenterX","description":"聚类中心","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Array[Double]","name":"Point","description":"点对象值","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Double","name":"nnDist","description":"点到聚类中心的距离","required":"true"}]}]
body.parameters: [{"default":"default","datatype":"String","name":"任务名称","description":"一个SPARK任务的名称"},{"default":"default","datatype":"String","name":"输入点数据","description":"详见input描述"},{"default":"default","datatype":"String","name":"输出聚类中心文件","description":"详见output描述"},{"default":"3","datatype":"Integer","name":"聚类类别个数","description":"结果中聚类类别的个数"},{"default":"20","datatype":"Integer","name":"最大迭代次数","description":"计算聚类中心时迭代次数的最大值"},{"default":"0.5","datatype":"Integer","name":"每个类中的最小个数","description":"最终聚类结果中各个类中点的最小个数"}]
body.test:
{"outDesc":"准确率99%;3 min","cmdline":"
		./bin/spark-submit 
		--master yarn-cluster 
		--num-executors 4 
		--executor-memory 2G 
		--executor-cores 4 
		--conf spark.default.parallelism=32 
		--class com.igsnrr.toolbox.spatialclustering.bitsectingkmeans.BKmeans 
		toolbox-0.0.1.jar /test/data/data_3d /test/data/data_3d_bkmeans_res   
		","in":"/test/data/data_3d","inDesc":"三维点数据;1000000","out":"/test/res/data_3d_res"}

body.name: 基于DBSCAN的点数据聚类
body.description: 输入数据的格式为TXT格式，输入文件根目录为点数据根目录，基于DBSCAN算法计算各点数据属于的类别
body.algo:
1.算法首先对点数据进行分区,使得每个区的点数尽可能相同
	2.在每个分区中执行本地DBSCAN算法
	3.合并分区，对重复点进行识别
	4.合并相似的簇，标记噪声点。
body.input: [{"path":"hdfs","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"double","name":"x1","description":"一维点坐标","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"double","name":"x2","description":"二维点坐标","required":"true"}]},{"path":"hdfs","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"double","name":"x1","description":"一维点坐标","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"double","name":"x2","description":"二维点坐标","required":"true"}]}]
body.out: [{"path":"file","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"Array[Double]","name":"value","description":"点对象值","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"String","name":"value","description":"点所属的聚类类别","required":"true"}]}]
body.parameters: [{"default":"default","datatype":"string","name":"任务名称","description":"一个SPARK任务的名称"},{"default":"250","datatype":"Integer","name":"maxPointsPerPartition","description":"每个分区中的最大点数"},{"default":"0.3","datatype":"integer","name":"eps","description":"邻域半径"},{"default":"10","datatype":"integer","name":"minPoints","description":"能够生成一个密度区的最小的点数"}]
body.interfaces: [{"intfcClass":"com.igsnrr.toolbox.spatialclustering.dbscan.algorithm.LocalDBSCANNaive","inParams":[{"default":"","datatype":"Array[DBSCANPoint]","name":"points","description":"原始点数据"}],"name":"fit","outParams":[{"default":"","datatype":"Array[DBSCANPoint]","name":"dbpoints","description":"经过标记后的点数据"}],"intfdesc":"基于DBSCAN算法对一系列点进行聚类，得到带有聚类标记的点数据"},{"inParams":[],"outParams":[]}]
body.test:
{"outDesc":";","cmdline":"
		./bin/spark-submit 
		--master yarn-cluster 
		--num-executors 4 
		--executor-memory 2G 
		--executor-cores 4 
		--conf spark.default.parallelism=32 
		--class com.igsnrr.toolbox.spatialclustering.dbscan.DBSCANTool 
		toolbox-0.0.1.jar test/data/raw_data.csv test/data/dbscan_res 250 0.3 10   
		","in":"/test/data/raw_data.csv","inDesc":"二维点数据;800","out":"/test/res/dbscan_res"}

body.name: 轨迹间相似度计算
body.description: 输入数据格式为TXT格式,输入文件根目录为轨迹数据根目录。基于特定的距离公式计算任意两条轨迹的距离
body.algo: DTW距离（Dynamic Time Wraping）计算方法：
body.input: [{"path":"hdfs","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"Long","name":"id","description":"轨迹id","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Array[Point]","name":"trjPts","description":"轨迹点序列(x1,y1;x2,y2;x3,y3;...)","required":"true"}]},{"path":"hdfs","type":"txt","fields":[{"default":"","datatype":"Long","name":"id","description":"轨迹id","required":"true"},{"default":"","datatype":"Array[Point]","name":"trjPts","description":"轨迹点序列(x1,y1;x2,y2;x3,y3;...)","required":"true"}]}]
body.parameters: [{"default":"default","datatype":"String","name":"任务名称","description":"一个SPARK任务的名称"},{"default":"default","datatype":"String","name":"输入轨迹数据","description":"详见input描述"},{"default":"default","datatype":"String","name":"输出轨迹间相似度文件","description":"详见output描述"}]
body.interfaces: [{"intfcClass":"com.igsnrr.toolbox.trjanls.trjsimilarity.TrjSimilarity","inParams":[{"default":"","datatype":"Trajectory","name":"trj1","description":"轨迹1"},{"default":"","datatype":"Trajectory","name":"trj2","description":"轨迹2"},{"default":"","datatype":"String","name":"距离模式","description":"轨迹相似度计算模式"}],"name":"trjEval","outParams":[{"default":"","datatype":"double","name":"trjSml","description":"两条轨迹间的相似度"}],"intfdesc":"计算两条轨迹的相似度"},{"intfcClass":"com.igsnrr.toolbox.trjanls.trjsimilarity.TrjSimilarity","inParams":[{"default":"","datatype":"String","name":"rawdata","description":""}],"name":"getTrajectory","outParams":[{"default":"","datatype":"Trajectory","name":"trj","description":""}],"intfdesc":"将原始的行文本文件转化为Trajecotry类型"}]
